sent.orig: Help after shape beforehand, be what finish in the mould on machine beforehand is help after.
sent.trans: 后帮的预成型，是在后帮预成型机上的模具中完成的。

sent.orig: Have you ever thought of telephoning your parents beforehand?
sent.trans: 你想过事先给你的父母打个电话吗？

sent.orig: If you are the meeting organizer, make sure you issue an agenda beforehand.
sent.trans: 如果您是会议组织者，请务必确认关于议程之前的问题。

sent.orig: It is conceivable that they knew about it beforehand.
sent.trans: 可以想见，他们预先就知道了这事。

sent.orig: He rehearsed the interview in his mind beforehand.
sent.trans: 他把面试时要说的话预先想好了。
